solution.text:
In the given set, there are eight elements but only three (_{j}_) that match our given requirement. We know that
\(P(E) = \frac{Number\;of\;trials\;in\;which\;E\;has\;happened}{Total\;number\;of\;trials}\)
Therefore the Probability of the Event, P(E), of choosing the number _{j}_ is : \(\frac{3}{8}\) = 0.375

content.text: What is the probability of choosing the number _{j}_ from the following set - { _{{j-k}}_ , _{{j-1}}_, _{j}_ , _{{j-2*k}}_ , _{j}_, _{j}_, _{{j+3*k}}_, _{{j+2*k}}_ }
